title: Short-Term Course for Enhancing Collaboration and Problem-Solving Skills Based on Educational Robotics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education using smartphones and simple robot kits, fostering collaboration and problem-solving skills through group projects

learning_goals: Learners autonomously resolve ≥80% of problems encountered during robot assembly and programming processes through 4-member group activities.
Learners clearly assign roles among group members during collaborative learning and submit ≥3 documented instances of communication.
Learners apply ≥2 creative approaches during problem-solving processes and organize them in their portfolio via video or image formats.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
